page.title: 07FARMING.
page.content: A high percentage of farm owners have changed from keeping live stock to arable farming.They changed to arable farming because it is more profitable. Most of the farmers grow Corn, Sugar Beet, and Potatoes, e.t.c. Among their machinery they have Combined Harvesters, Tractors, and Sugar Beet Harvesters. They also have machines to spray their crops with chemicals, to protect the crops from insects and parasites. The farmers own the farms they work.The farms have been in their families for years. The farmers employ out side help to work for them in the busy seasons but they depend on their own families to do most of the farm work.Every farmer owns around the same amount of land- approximately Two Hundred and Thirty acres.
